harmonizer 0.3
  • Reference

    Combines (with & funciton) two logical vectors. One is arg.name from dots the other is arg.val. Checks if they are the same length.

    dots.and.Rd

    Combines (with & funciton) two logical vectors. One is arg.name from dots the other is arg.val. Checks if they are the same length.

    dots.and(
  arg.name,
  arg.val,
  env = parent.frame(),
  dots = eval(expression(list(...)), envir = env)
)

    Arguments

    arg.name

    Name of argument in dots to combine (&) arg.val with

    arg.val

    Logical vector for combining with arg.name value in dots

    env

    Do not set. This function needs its calling environment.

    dots

    Do not set. This function needs ... (dots) values of calling

    Value

    Updated value for dots argument.

    Contents

    Developed by Stanislav Vlasov.
